Orangutan in Sumatra'

by

Posted on January 1, 2019 at 12:00 PM

I took this photo in 2011 in Sumatra. I of my dream since I'm 10 years old was to meet Orangutan in the jungle. It finally happened in August 2011 in Sumatra. The quality of the photo is not so good because the light was quite low.
